title: Serious rubber banding
body: While my ping never goes above 64ms I am getting serious rubbing banding issues. I am trying to play URF while it is still around but it isn't fun in a game where you spend most of your time trying to skill shot people to death when an entire team fight goes down and you still haven't caught up yet.

replies.body:
Rubber banding is super crappy, I agree! Most of the time, it's caused by packet loss or high packet buffering that results from poor ISP routing or local network settings. As a quick check, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are good.

Let me know if those changes caused any difference in your rubber banding.
